brain: the organ you use to think
the tissue that is related with remembering things
heart: the organ that could promote blood flow
lungs: the organ that could be used for breathing
stomach: the organ which has the effect of digesting food
kidneys: the organ which has the effect of excreting body waste
the organ which has the effect of adjusting water and osmotic pressure balance
liver: the organ that could be used for detoxicating
the organ which has the effect of detoxicating
pancreas: the organ that could be used for secreting enzymes
bladder: the organ which has the effect of storing urine
the organ that could store urine
